## Source: amazon-inspector (c8d977ed41d3fbf548651b650de7a64445638d9290c37650ea4063a4cdb9dfab)
The package spire.officejs-document was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f8f7f0d20e495c0f30b44adfa086e10b55a1b89a33c73ebc9eaea017b9a2cfef)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'spire.officejs-document' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
